pages.text: Automatic collector can collect items generated by the core automatically, replacing your $(l:1_io_tools/world_interaction_wand)world interaction wand$()

Some cores that can not fill into the $(l:1_io_tools/world_interaction_wand)wand$() can only be put in the automatic collector. $(br2)There are also some cores that can only fill into the wand. $(br2)Please refer to JEI for the items dropped by the core when put in the automatic collector.
